Articles.Content: Floor 123: a bunch of Kerbal astronauts shaking in fear and a few sobbing. out side the window you can see rockets exploding and the Kerbals entering the building
Floor 124: Welcome to the Mesosphere! Just a few more floors and you'll be really in space!

Floor 125: LFO Tank storage.

Warning, flammable.
Floor 126: Sorry we are out of cake. Send in complaints to offices on floor ___, thank you.
Floor 127: Jeb racing his friends in a go-kart.
Floor 128: Thousands of cubicles, arranged in a maze. A sign says all questions here and points into it. good luck

Floor 129: After ten hours of running through the maze of cubicles you reach this floor. There is a map of the previous floor telling you how to get past in only two minutes. *swearing censured*

Edited July 8, 2013 by Rockcoole
floor 130 every one is dead on this floor millions of dead bodies
floor 131: Admiral General Aladeen's private floor.
Floor 132: Shoe Shopping.
Floor 133: Admiral Ackbar on a small platform surrounded by all manner of traps (including, but not limited to, mouse traps, pitfalls, tripwires, and the occasional landmine).
Floor 134: An IRC chat room with the enigma gang. Your brain has been scarred for life
Floor 135: Welcome to space! And just in time to see the Aurora! Do you want to look at it?
Floor 136: a space-themed rave party playing dubstep
Floor 137: Space-suits for you to space-walk to the next floor, considering this floor is nothing but 2 airlocks and a massive titanium-tungsten tether to the orbiting rest of the building.
Floor 138: While you were spacewalking to this floor full of Windows, a rocket flew by and smashed into floor 139, how inconvenient, looks like you'll still need that suit for the next floor!
Floor 139: This floor does not exist anymore due to the rocket smashing into floor 139. EVA your way to floor 140.
Floor 140: Black room, a single light in the middle and it smells BBQ.
Floor 141: A huge lawn party with tons of grills dripping grease down into floor 140.
Floor 142: a floor full of elevators leading down to every floor below.
Floor 143: A purple gap with eyes drops you down into it. You fall into another skyscraper at the same floor.
Floor 144: Please wear a spacesuit with helmets on, and please take the elevator to GSO floor. There's no stair to go to that floor.

The elevator to GSO is broken.

Jump to Floor 145.
Floor 145: You are smart. Welcome to GSO! You are now orbiting in the same period as the planet. EVA to floor 146. It's not far.
Floor 146: The floors above are starting to move away....
